name: Return Tape
description:
I wanted to lay the spirits of “Ghost Tape Number 10” to rest, so I made a lake-portal for them to leave through. Each ghost has its own personality and emits a song made by resynthesizing the audio data in “Ghost Tape Number 10.” Walk with them to listen.

Donations

On Dec 31, 2021 I'll donate any proceeds to the Coalition for Rainforest Nations. If you choose not to donate, or prefer to donate directly on their website, feel free to click the button labeled "no thanks, just take me to the downloads." If you contribute at least $8, you'll also get the full-quality soundtrack (eight songs, each about two minutes, plus the forest ambience).

Controls Key
ActionMouseLook around
WASDMove (forward, left, backward, right)ShiftHold while moving to walk faster
SpaceJumpEscExit game


Please let me know in the comments or via email (damondpham@gmail.com) if you encounter any problems.
